# ManipulationComponent.InputDevice.Chirality

**Enumeration**

Describes hand chirality (left or right) of an input device.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Chirality
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **ManipulationComponent.InputDevice.Chirality.left**: The left-handed chirality.
- **ManipulationComponent.InputDevice.Chirality.right**: The right-handed chirality.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
title: ManipulationComponent.InputDevice.Chirality
